about_the_game:
Timberwind is under attack. You, Elian, a nobleman and the only rightful heir to the town are the last person to defend your right against an evil rival nobleman. Together with his minions, the nobleman is attempting to take away what is rightfully yours. Your citizens rely on you to protect their freedom, houses, and life.

Let the villagers guide you through the defense of Timberwind and complete several quests in order to defy the attacker and bring peace upon Timberwind.
Will you rise as the savior Timberwind desperately needs? The fate of the town rests in your hands!



With six distinct classes, each offering unique abilities and strategic advantages, you can fight your way. Will you be an aggressive Attacker, a protective Defender, a supportive Healer, a versatile Supporter, a stealthy Hunter, or a master of destruction with the MagiKill class? Each class offers you unique attacks and traits that shape each battle in your way.

Earn XP through combat and quest completion to level up, unlocking attribute points to enhance your character’s astuteness, charisma, dexterity, health, strength, and wisdom. Every decision makes your hero stronger and more prepared for the battles ahead.



Once you complete all quests, you are thrown into a multiplayer world where you and your fellow noblemen have to face more enemies and eventually, the final boss. By switching to multiplayer, you are sure to encounter new and exciting endeavors that you have not experienced in the singleplayer experience yet.
detailed_description:
Timberwind is under attack. You, Elian, a nobleman and the only rightful heir to the town are the last person to defend your right against an evil rival nobleman. Together with his minions, the nobleman is attempting to take away what is rightfully yours. Your citizens rely on you to protect their freedom, houses, and life.

Let the villagers guide you through the defense of Timberwind and complete several quests in order to defy the attacker and bring peace upon Timberwind.
Will you rise as the savior Timberwind desperately needs? The fate of the town rests in your hands!



With six distinct classes, each offering unique abilities and strategic advantages, you can fight your way. Will you be an aggressive Attacker, a protective Defender, a supportive Healer, a versatile Supporter, a stealthy Hunter, or a master of destruction with the MagiKill class? Each class offers you unique attacks and traits that shape each battle in your way.

Earn XP through combat and quest completion to level up, unlocking attribute points to enhance your character’s astuteness, charisma, dexterity, health, strength, and wisdom. Every decision makes your hero stronger and more prepared for the battles ahead.



Once you complete all quests, you are thrown into a multiplayer world where you and your fellow noblemen have to face more enemies and eventually, the final boss. By switching to multiplayer, you are sure to encounter new and exciting endeavors that you have not experienced in the singleplayer experience yet.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 MB available space

name: The Ancestors

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 or comparable
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Defend Timberwind from the evil nobleman by completing challenging quests in the picturesque medieval town. Choose your preferred fighter class, gain XP, and eventually move to an epic multiplayer battle.
